column2:
"Hey, partner! Am I glad to see you! I've got
a favor to ask. Will you hear me out?"

"Would you mind checking out the situation
down on Naberius for me?"

"Why? Oh, um... It's a little embarrassing,
but our first battle there was kinda traumatizing,
and now I'm too freaked out to go there."

"You're the only one I can talk to about this,
so please! You've got to help me out with
this one. Whenever you have the time is fine."
